AiorosVistas.ForegroundWidth_Hint: How wide is the vista at its closest point
AiorosVistas.HorizonTop_Hint: Position of the horizon, as a percentage from the top
AiorosVistas.MaxTop_Hint: Highest point a placeable can go, as a percentage from the top
AiorosVistas.ParallaxStrength_Hint: Strength of the parallax effect on pan
AiorosVistas.Width_Hint: Width of this object in Vista scenes
AiorosVistas.Height_Hint: Height of this object in Vista scenes
